name: SILEX BR-300AN
description:
With operation log saving function

BR-300AN is a wireless bridge device which can easily convert a 10/100/1000BASE-T wired LAN device to a wireless LAN device. It supports a wireless LAN communication in the 2.4GHz and 5GHz bands and enables a wired LAN device to join in a wireless LAN environment easily. It also supports enterprise security which allows you to use the Wireless Bridge BR-300AN reliably even in environments such as offices and healthcare sites which require security. This product is not available in North America.


WITH OPERATION LOG SAVING FUNCTION

BR-300AN is a wireless bridge device which can easily convert a 10/100/1000BASE-T wired LAN device to a wireless LAN device. It supports a wireless LAN communication in the 2.4GHz and 5GHz bands and enables a wired LAN device to join in a wireless LAN environment easily. It also supports enterprise security which allows you to use the Wireless Bridge BR-300AN reliably even in environments such as offices, health care sites that require security.


Features and Benefits

Can be used in 'single-client-mode' and 'multi-client-mode' with up to 16 devices in combination with a Hub/Switch. Both hardware and software are developed and manufactured by SILEX with AMC Manager support
shortDescription:
• Device mobilization is realized
  • Operation log saving function
  • Advanced security function
  • Integrated device control software

specifications.title: Push button:
specifications.value1: Operation mode switching, default setting and smart wireless

specifications.value1: Web browser (supports AMC Finder), AMC Manager

name: SILEX DS-510
description:
The Silex DS-510 is designed to easily connect and share USB devices over a network. Printers, Scanners, Disk Drives, Card Readers, or virtually any other USB device can be now be enabled with network capability. It allows flexibility to place the USB device anywhere on the network instead of needing to be attached directly to the computer, and multiple users can access the USB device.


Feature and Benefits

High-Performance data throughput due to optimized performance and gigabit connection. When the device server is not used, the power supply to the USB bus is turned off to save energy. This device is ideal for virtual environments and Citrix Ready certified.
shortDescription:
• High data throughput and Gigabit connection
  • Energy Saver Mode
  • Printer Auto Connect features to share
  • Isochronous Transfer Mode
  • Best Compatibility with a variety of devices
  • Compatible with virtualization programs
  • Needs no drivers to use the USB devices

specifications.title: OS:
specifications.value1: Windows 7/8/8.1/10, Windows Server 2019/ 2016/2012(R1, R2)/2008(R2), Mac OS X (PowerPC: Ver10.3.x to Ver10.5.x, Intel: Ver10.4.4 to Ver10.14.x)

name: SILEX DS-520AN
description:
Silex DS-520AN 802.11n Wireless and Gigabit Ethernet USB Device Server

The DS-520AN is a USB Device Server supporting 802.11n Wireless LAN or Gigabit Ethernet Wired LAN Networks. Any USB device can be used over a wired/wireless network with the DS-520AN just as though it was connected to a computer.


Gigabit Ethernet USB Device Server

Office equipment such as USB scanners, multi-function printers (MFPs), dongles, hard disk drives, and cameras etc. frequently lack a wireless interface thus making them unavailable to connected devices such as computers, tablets, and smartphones. The DS-520AN Wireless USB Device Server replaces the USB cable with an enterprise-secure wireless or wired LAN connection.


Features and Benefits

The DS-520AN Supports Enterprise Security (IEEE802.1X) , Full-Speed / High-Speed Isochronous Transfers for real-time data transfers from USB cameras and speakers. The 802.11n wireless connection supports up to 300Mbps or the wired Gigabit Ethernet connection supports up to 1Gbps throughput.
shortDescription:
• Supports Enterprise Security
  • One Hi-Speed USB
  • Standard TCP/IP printing

Ver10.14.x)

name: SILEX DS-600
description:
SILEX DS-600 GIGABIT USB 3.0 HIGH THROUGHPUT DEVICE SERVER

The Silex DS-600 is designed to easily connect and share USB 3.0 and 2.0 devices over a network. Printers, Scanners, Disk Drives, Cameras, Card Readers, or virtually any other USB device can be now be enabled with network capability. It allows flexibility to place the USB device anywhere on the network instead of needing to be attached directly to the computer, and multiple users can access the USB device.


HIGH THROUGHPUT AND ENTERPRISE SECURITY

More and more USB devices such as scanners, multi-function printers (MFPs), hard disk drives, and cameras have been used in offices. The USB Device Server allows you to use these devices on a network, improving installation flexibility without troublesome USB cables. This also reduces installation costs by enabling USB devices to be easily shared in the office in a cost optimized way.


Features and Benefits

Achieves high-performance data throughput due to optimized performance and Gigabit connection. Supports Enterprise Security and high speed isochronous USB transfer for streaming applications making it ideal for Virtual Environments.
shortDescription:
• High-Performance data throughput
  • Enterprise Security Features
  • Isochronous Transfer mode
  • Standard TCP/IP printing (LPR/RAW)
  • Supports NAS (Network Attached Storage) function compatible with USB-Hubs
  • Compatibility with a variety of USB devices over the network compatible with virtualization programs and environments
  • No special needed to use the USB devices

specifications.title: Device interface:
specifications.value1: 1 x USB 3.0 SUPERSPEED (Type A) and 1 x USB 2.0 Hi-Speed (type A)

specifications.title: Configuration:
specifications.value1: Setup utility (Device Server Setup), Web browser
